subject: Football
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A seemingly spectacular catch on fourth down late in the game by the Cowboys’ Dez Bryant was overturned, helping to seal the Packers’ 26-21 victory on Sunday.
snippet: A seemingly spectacular catch on fourth down late in the game by the Cowboys’ Dez Bryant was overturned, helping to seal the Packers’ 26-21 victory on Sunday.
